query:
UPDATE challenges SET hostProfileImage = CASE 
  WHEN hostUsername = 'kimitolink' THEN 'https://ui-avatars.com/api/?name=%E3%82%8A%E3%82%93%E3%81%8F&background=EC4899&color=fff&size=128'
  WHEN hostUsername = 'idolfunch' THEN 'https://ui-avatars.com/api/?name=%E3%82%A2%E3%82%A4%E3%83%89%E3%83%AB&background=8B5CF6&color=fff&size=128'
  WHEN hostUsername = 'konta_idol' THEN 'https://ui-avatars.com/api/?name=%E3%81%93%E3%82%93%E5%A4%AA&background=DD6500&color=fff&size=128'
  WHEN hostUsername = 'tanunee_idol' THEN 'https://ui-avatars.com/api/?name=%E3%81%9F%E3%81%AC%E5%A7%89&background=22C55E&color=fff&size=128'
  WHEN hostUsername = 'link_official' THEN 'https://ui-avatars.com/api/?name=%E3%83%AA%E3%83%B3%E3%82%AF&background=3B82F6&color=fff&size=128'
  WHEN hostUsername = 'idol_unit_a' THEN 'https://ui-avatars.com/api/?name=Unit+A&background=F59E0B&color=fff&size=128'
  ELSE hostProfileImage
END
WHERE hostUsername IN ('kimitolink', 'idolfunch', 'konta_idol', 'tanunee_idol', 'link_official', 'idol_unit_a');
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3YCTtbVp6bbE1oz.aaf91d266729 --database 4EfvvuNg9KRk4UPdFprmBJ --execute UPDATE challenges SET hostProfileImage = CASE 
  WHEN hostUsername = 'kimitolink' THEN 'https://ui-avatars.com/api/?name=%E3%82%8A%E3%82%93%E3%81%8F&background=EC4899&color=fff&size=128'

  WHEN hostUsername = 'konta_idol' THEN 'https://ui-avatars.com/api/?name=%E3%81%93%E3%82%93%E5%A4%AA&background=DD6500&color=fff&size=128'
  WHEN hostUsername = 'tanunee_idol' THEN 'https://ui-avatars.com/api/?name=%E3%81%9F%E3%81%AC%E5%A7%89&background=22C55E&color=fff&size=128'
  WHEN hostUsername = 'link_official' THEN 'https://ui-avatars.com/api/?name=%E3%83%AA%E3%83%B3%E3%82%AF&background=3B82F6&color=fff&size=128'
  WHEN hostUsername = 'idol_unit_a' THEN 'https://ui-avatars.com/api/?name=Unit+A&background=F59E0B&color=fff&size=128'
  ELSE hostProfileImage
END
WHERE hostUsername IN ('kimitolink', 'idolfunch', 'konta_idol', 'tanunee_idol', 'link_official', 'idol_unit_a');
